query:
UPDATE island_guides 
SET topThingsToDo = JSON_ARRAY(
  JSON_OBJECT('title', 'ğŸ„ Relax on the Bikini Beaches', 'description', 'North and South beaches with soft white sand, calm lagoon, wooden swings, sea turtles'),
  JSON_OBJECT('title', 'ğŸ¢ Snorkel With Sea Turtles', 'description', 'Spot green and hawksbill turtles near the drop-off daily'),
  JSON_OBJECT('title', 'ğŸ‰ Take a Fruit Farm Tour', 'description', 'Visit watermelon fields, papaya orchards, taste fresh tropical fruits'),
  JSON_OBJECT('title', 'ğŸŒ… Sunset Beach Walks', 'description', 'Experience dramatic orange, gold, and pink skies at sunset'),
  JSON_OBJECT('title', 'ğŸš´ Island Cycling', 'description', 'Free bicycles provided by guesthouses, explore through palm tunnels and farmland')
),
foodCafes = JSON_ARRAY(
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'ğŸ Fresh Fruit Stands', 'description', 'Local fresh fruits and tropical juices'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'ğŸ½ï¸ Local Restaurants', 'description', 'Traditional Maldivian cuisine'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'ğŸ  Guesthouse Restaurants', 'description', 'Home-cooked meals and seafood')
),
faq = JSON_ARRAY(
  JSON_OBJECT('question', 'ğŸï¸ Is Thoddoo safe?', 'answer', 'Yes, very safe. Clean, organized local island with friendly residents and low crime rates.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('question', 'ğŸŒ What is the best time to visit?', 'answer', 'Year-round is good. Dry season (March-April, September-October) offers best weather.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('question', 'ğŸ’° How much does accommodation cost?', 'answer', 'Budget guesthouses range from $35-50/night, boutique options up to $100+/night.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('question', 'ğŸ¢ Can I see sea turtles?', 'answer', 'Yes, green and hawksbill turtles are abundant near the drop-off, especially at North Bikini Beach.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('question', 'ğŸ¤¿ Is snorkeling good here?', 'answer', 'Excellent! You can snorkel directly from the beaches and see turtles, rays, and colorful fish daily.')
)
WHERE name = 'Thoddoo'
